duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level administrative support to the CEO and executive leadership team, including calendar management and appointment scheduling.
Assist with payroll, financial management, Quickbooks tracking and reporting, and employee benefit plans.
Manage virtual and in-person events, programs, and special initiatives.
Support KNN business infrastructure including equipment and IT resources.
Assist with organization's general functions including membership, advocacy, and member education.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or relevant field (preferred)
